Pre-Game Insights: Argentina is looking to become the tournament’s historic champion with a record-breaking 16 wins.
A lot is on the line for both teams.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida.
The game will be streamed on DirecTV Stream, fuboTV, Sling, or Hulu + Live TV.
Resale tickets are available on platforms like Vivid Seats, SeatGeek, and StubHub, with prices at an all-time high for the final match.
Others: Colombia has a 28-game streak after defeating Uruguay in the semifinals.
Argentina advanced to the final after defeating Canada in the semifinals with a 2-0 victory.
Jefferson Lerma scored in the 39th minute to give Colombia a 1-0 victory over Uruguay in the semifinals.
Julián Álvarez scored in the first half of the semifinal against Canada, and Lionel Messi secured Argentina's spot with his first goal in the tournament.
